name: Tumedus
description:
Action rogue-like dungeon crawler! Hack and slash your way through hordes of enemies!

Cheesy context that was not implemented due to time constraints:

A great darkness lurks in these pits, the hell tomb they call it. Ancient creatures wander the tunnels in great numbers. You ought to be careful, many braves before you have gone and failed in search of the treasures they guard. However, that’s not what you’re really here for. You have been summoned to finally close off these dark halls, before the darkness calls the eternal night. Go, and restore stability to the land.

Made for Ludum dare 49
